Articles.Content: Any craft equipped with any kind of landing gear (stock) starts flipping and spinning wildly as soon as the landing gear (wheels or fixed) touches the ground upon flight launch. Sometimes the game crashes. Any help? Here's a link to my output_log: https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=902BE10C38C616F5!86151&authkey=!AKw8GDe0NpdLET8&ithint=file%2ctxt

8 hours ago, Voodoo8648 said:

Any craft equipped with any kind of landing gear (stock) starts flipping and spinning wildly as soon as the landing gear (wheels or fixed) touches the ground upon flight launch. Sometimes the game crashes. Any help? Here's a link to my output_log: https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=902BE10C38C616F5!86151&authkey=!AKw8GDe0NpdLET8&ithint=file%2ctxt

@Voodoo8648 This is most likely the bug relating to the physics of the wheels. This is due to the upgrade to unity 5, the next ksp patch should deal with it. Until then, its the waiting game.
